Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.cards.behaviours.buildBehaviours

Class BasicBuildBehaviour

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.cards.AbstractGodCard
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.cards.BasicGodCard
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.cards.behaviours.buildBehaviours.BasicBuildBehaviour
All Implemented Interfaces:
BuildBehaviour, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DoubleDifferentSpaceBehaviour, DoubleSameSpaceBehaviour, RemoveBlockFromNeighbourBehaviour
public class BasicBuildBehaviour
extends BasicGodCard
implements BuildBehaviour
This is a basic build behaviour. Having this as build behaviour means that the card will be able only to build blocks and domes according to the basic rules of a worker.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • genericAskForBuild

      public DataToBuild genericAskForBuild​(GameSession gameSession) throws GameEndedException
      This method is called for a generic ask to build. So it will be possible for the player to build either a dome or a block (according to rules).
      Overrides:
      genericAskForBuild in class BasicGodCard
      Parameters:
      gameSession - This is a reference to the main access to the game database.
      Returns:
      The data representing the choice where to build of the player. They are used by the controller to change the model.
      Throws:
      GameEndedException - if the player that was asked to build something exits the game. This is treated as an exception because it should be a not-expected behaviour from the player.

    • askForBuild

      public ActionResponse askForBuild​(GameSession gameSession, java.util.HashMap<Coord,​java.util.ArrayList<Coord>> availablePositionsBuildBlock, java.lang.String message) throws GameEndedException
      This method asks to the player where he wants to build, choosing within the cells passed as parameter of the method.
      Overrides:
      askForBuild in class BasicGodCard
      Parameters:
      gameSession - This is a reference to the main access to the game database.
      availablePositionsBuildBlock - The positions where the workers can build.
      message - The message sent to the client and used to ask him where he wants to build.
      Returns:
      The response arrived from the client with the position where to build.
      Throws:
      GameEndedException - if the player decides to leave the game during his turn.

    • handleInitBuild

      public void handleInitBuild​(GameSession gameSession) throws GameEndedException
      This method is used for a basic build behaviour, that is the one without use of god cards.
      Specified by:
      handleInitBuild in interface BuildBehaviour
      Parameters:
      gameSession - This is a reference to the main access to the game database.
      Throws:
      GameEndedException - if the player decides to leave the game during his turn.
